file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 21-27-02-04 - BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT CHECK VALVES - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT CHECK VALVES - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: CLASS-C BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the baggage compartment check valves. B. There is one check valve installed at the forward baggage compartment partition and one check valve installed at the aft pressure bulkhead partition. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY CLASS-C BAGGAGE BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT CHECK 21-27-02-000-801-A COMPARTMENT VALVES - REMOVAL CLASS-C BAGGAGE BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT CHECK 21-27-02-400-801-A COMPARTMENT VALVES - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 21-27-02 Page 1 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-27-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: CLASS-C BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT 2. BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT CHECK VALVES - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the baggage compartment check valves. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 813 813 Baggage compartment C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 01 Does the task Baggage compartment H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open the baggage compartment door. I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the check valve installed at the forward baggage compartment partition as follows: (a) Remove the guard assembly (4). (b) Remove the blow-out panel assembly (3). (c) Remove the screws (1). (d) Remove the check valve (2). (2) Remove the check valve installed at the aft pressure bulkhead partition as follows: (a) Remove the screws (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 21-27-02 Page 2 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (b) Remove the guard assembly (2) and check valve (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 21-27-02 Page 3 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: CLASS-C BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT Baggage Compartment Check Valves - Removal/Installation Figure 401 - Sheet 2 AFT PRESSURE BULKHEAD PARTITION A B DET. A 1. CHECK VALVE 2. GUARD ASSEMBLY 3. SCREW DET. B 145AMM210184.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 21-27-02 Page 5 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-27-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: CLASS-C BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT 3. BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT CHECK VALVES - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the baggage compartment check valves. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 813 813 Baggage compartment C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 01 Does the task Baggage compartment H. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the check valve installed at the forward cargo compartment partition as follows: (a) Position the check valve at the blow-out panel. (b) Install the screws. CAUTION: THE CHECK VALVE MUST BE INSTALLED IN SUCH A POSITION AS TO PERMIT VENTILATION FROM THE PASSENGER CABIN TO THE BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT. (c) Install the blow-out panel. (d) Install the guard assembly. (2) Install the check valve installed at the aft pressure bulkhead partition as follows: CAUTION: THE CHECK VALVE MUST BE INSTALLED IN SUCH A POSITION AS TO PERMIT VENTILATION FROM THE BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT TO THE AFT ELECTRONIC COMPARTMENT. (a) Put the check valve and guard assembly in position. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 21-27-02 Page 6 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (b) Install the screws. I. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close the baggage compartment door. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 21-27-02 Page 7 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
